title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 587 - Access to Agency Records; Open Meetings; Conflicts of Interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 587 - Access to Agency Records; Open Meetings; Conflicts of Interest

State Regulations
§ 587.1 - Access to agency records
§ 587.2 - Open meetings
§ 587.3 - Conflicts of interest
§ 587.4 - Ex parte communications prohibited

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 587

Statutory authority: Executive Law, § 804[9]; Public

Officers Law, §§ 87 [1][b], 95, 104[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
